title: The Great British Bake Off: Another Slice
description: A book that celebrates the phenomenon that is Bake Off and gives fans of the series a glimpse behind the scenes, a chance to relive the highs and lows of all the series past series, and generally revel in how the Great British public has been inspired to bake, cook and create by a show that has taken the country by storm. A feast of bake-related confections that's guaranteed to sate the appetite of armchair bakers and cake-making addicts everywhere.
author: Andy Baker
